about_the_game:
Product Overview.
“SMILE Characters Vol. 1" is a 3D model resource pack of cute deformed characters created completely new by LastSmile based on the SMILE GAME BUILDER standard asset character designs. A total of fifty 3D models (plus nine variations) and forty types of motion are available. These models can be used to create story-lifting effects and powerful 3D battles that cannot be achieved with standard assets alone.

Includes a game file of SMILE Character Quest, a remake version of SGB Quest! The "SMILE Character Quest" is a remake version of the "SGB Quest" that uses the 3D models from this DLC and a number of features that have been implemented in previous updates to add a multitude of effects. It is possible to apply the techniques used in this game file to your own games, as well as to modify it and enjoy the fan fiction.

---Details---
[SMILE Characters Vol.1]
Fifty 3D models (9 variations of characters) + bonus

10 Hero models
10 Heroine models
26 people models
4 Evil models
9 variations of characters
Bonus data
Sample game "SMILE Character Quest







*There are no restrictions on the distribution of games that use the 3D models included in this DLC. No royalties will be paid to us for distribution of the game, whether with or without compensation.
Please refer to Article 5 of the EULA (Downloadable Content License Agreement) for modification and redistribution of 3D.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo processor or AMD Athlon™ 64
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD graphics 4400 or more, Radeon HD graphics 5430 or more, OpenGL 3.0 or more
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows7/8/10 (32/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core or AMD Athlon™ II (K10)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® 400 series, AMD Radeon™ HD 5000 series
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Additional Notes: Performance is not guaranteed under a virtual or emulated environment.

short_description: Based on the SMILE GAME BUILDER standard asset character designs, LastSmile has created a completely new 3D model resource pack of cute deformed characters. A total of 50 figures (plus 9 variations) and 40 types of motion are available.
